Posted By: scarecrowk (6/24/2012 11:32:54 PM)
Rating:

posts.post_content:
The best burn spell for 4 mana. Violent Eruption is an instant, does 4 damage, can target a creature or player, and you can redistribute that damage among any number of targets. The Madness ability is just icing on the cake.
  
   
[Pyrotechnics](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Pyrotechnics) costs more and is a sorcery.
  
[Lightning Blast](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Lightning Blast) cannot divide the damage.
  
[Rekindled Flame](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Rekindled Flame) is a sorcery that cannot divide damage.
  
Unless you're playing multiple mana types, Violent Eruption appears better.
  
   
[Flame Javelin](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Flame Javelin) is more efficient at dealing 4 damage at 3 mana, but Violent Eruption's added cost is more than worth the flexibility of dividing the damage up.
posts.html:
The best burn spell for 4 mana. Violent Eruption is an instant, does 4 damage, can target a creature or player, and you can redistribute that damage among any number of targets. The Madness ability is just icing on the cake.

Pyrotechnics costs more and is a sorcery.
Lightning Blast cannot divide the damage.
Rekindled Flame is a sorcery that cannot divide damage.
Unless you're playing multiple mana types, Violent Eruption appears better.

Flame Javelin is more efficient at dealing 4 damage at 3 mana, but Violent Eruption's added cost is more than worth the flexibility of dividing the damage up.

posts.post_content:
do deal 1 damage to two targets and 2 damage to a third target, you would need ![8](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=8&type=symbol)![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol) for a fireball or ![4](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=4&type=symbol)![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol)![Red](/Handlers/Image.ashx?size=small&name=R&type=symbol) for a rolling thunder. Everytime I play this spell I feel like I'm getting away with highway robbery. Combined with [Chandra's Spitfire](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Chandra's Spitfire) in multiplayer games (with at least 4 other opponents), each spitfire becomes a 13/3 Flier at instant speed.   
This spell is useful early, and as a finisher.   
Obviously this wants to be in a mono-red deck, but removal this powerful and versatile should have a restriction like that.

This spell is useful early, and as a finisher.
